answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hello Pamela,
You must be looking for ICMA-RC. (Although they are affiliated, ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can reach ICMA-RC by calling 1-800-669-7400 or visiting www.icma-rc.org.
